alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Robertson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 6:45AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Davidson, northeastern Dickson, southeastern Montgomery, northern Cheatham and southwestern Robertson Counties through 715 AM CST... At 645 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Ashland City, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Ashland City, Goodlettsville, Millersville, Greenbrier, Coopertown, Ridgetop, Joelton, Pleasant View and Cheatham Dam. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 95 and 98. Interstate 24 between mile markers 19 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
